Reviews.Title: A steal for serous photographers & THE KIT to have for first time photographers looking for something more than a point & shoot
Reviews.Author: Alexander Payson
Reviews.Content: This is such a bargain; great price for a high quality camera plus great extras. This package really exceeded my expectations with coming with 3 batteries, a 64 gig class 10 sd card plus an extra adaptable car charger ect....at the moment this is the best deal I came across over months of searching. THIS BEATS ADORAMAS PRICES. Adorama's current price on a USED nikon coolpix a is $850 let alone its retail price of $1,096 without extra batteries, memory card, camera case, cleaning kits ect. THIS PACKAGE FROM EBasket IS AN EXCELLENT KIT FOR SERIOUS/PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHERS & FIRST TIME PHOTOGRAPHERS LOOKING FOR A BARGEN. I would recommend this kit for serious/professional for the convince of the included extra batteries & a high grade memory card, & for BEGINNING PHOTOGRAPHERS looking to get into photography this is THE KIT TO HAVE; it comes with everything you would need to get started.
